Room.Name: Delegation Way/Darmanian Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Darmanian Way and Delegation Way.
Room.LongDescription: Delegation Way heads to the north from the intersection with Darmanian Way, which runs east and west. To the south, you can see the crystal clear waters of the Lyanden Lake and the magnificent Lyanden Castle, situated on the small island in the middle of the lake.
